mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select w.imagepath, g.* from wmember w, guide_board g where w.name= g.gb_name and g.gb_category_addr like '%'||#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' order by seq_guide desc)b)a where a.rnum >= to_number(#{start}) and a.rnum <= to_number(#{end})
select count(*) from guide_board where gb_category_addr like '%'||#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
mapper.update: update wmember set guide='Y' where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.insert: insert into guide_board( SEQ_GUIDE, GB_NAME, GB_TITLE, GB_ADDRESS, GB_LAT, GB_LON, GB_KEYWORD, GB_CONTENT, GB_STATE, GB_PREVIEW_IMGPATH, GB_HITS, GB_LANGUAGE, GB_TIME, GB_PRICE, CRE_DATE, UPD_DATE, GB_CATEGORY_ADDR, GB_ADDRESS_NAME, GB_SERVICE, GB_MEET_TIME, GB_THEME, GB_SCORE ) values (guide_seq.nextval, #{gb_name}, #{gb_title}, #{gb_address}, #{gb_lat}, #{gb_lon}, #{gb_keyword}, #{gb_content}, '0', #{gb_preview_imgpath}, 0, #{gb_language}, #{gb_time}, #{gb_price}, sysdate, null, #{gb_category_addr}, #{gb_address_name}, #{gb_service}, #{gb_meet_time}, #{gb_theme},0 )
mapper.select: select guide from wmember where m_id=#{id}
select w.imagepath,g.* from wmember w, guide_board g where seq_guide = #{num} and g.gb_name like w.name

select a.* from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select w.imagepath, g.* from wmember w, (select * from guide_board where gb_title like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or gb_keyword like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or gb_category_addr like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')g where g.gb_category_addr like '%'||#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and w.name= g.gb_name order by seq_guide desc)b)a where a.rnum >= to_number(#{start}) and a.rnum <= to_number(#{end})

select count(*) from guide_board where gb_category_addr like '%'||#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and (gb_title like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or gb_keyword like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or gb_category_addr like '%'||#{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' )

select SEQ_GUIDE, GB_NAME, GB_TITLE, GB_ADDRESS, GB_LAT, GB_LON, GB_KEYWORD, GB_CONTENT, GB_STATE, GB_PREVIEW_IMGPATH, GB_HITS, GB_LANGUAGE, GB_TIME, GB_PRICE, CRE_DATE, UPD_DATE, GB_CATEGORY_ADDR, GB_ADDRESS_NAME, GB_SERVICE, GB_MEET_TIME, GB_THEME, GB_SCORE, power((gb_lat-#{lat}),2) + power((gb_lon-#{lon}),2) from guide_board where power((gb_lat-#{lat}),2) + power((gb_lon-#{lon}),2) <= 0.002
